ta.title: වැඩිහිටි දීමනාව හෙට ගිණුම්වලට
body_lines: අස්වැසුම ප්‍රතිලාභී පවුල් වල වයස අවුරුදු 70ට වැඩි වැඩිහිටියන් සඳහා මෙම දීමනාව ලබා දෙයි.
அதன்படி, நலன்புரி நன்மை வாரியம் ரூ. 30 பில்லியன் 602,852 பயனாளிகளுக்கு வரவு வைக்கப்படும்.

en.title: Adult offer to the accounts tomorrow
body_lines: The Welfare Benefits Committee said that the September 26 is Rs.
The beneficiary families will be given this allowance for adults over 70 years of age.
Accordingly, the Welfare Benefit Board says that Rs. 30 billion will be credited to 602,852 beneficiaries.
